author: WSJ Staff
title: WSJ Wealth Adviser Briefing: Argentina, Crypto, Summer Beer
text: Despite having built a billion-dollar cosmetics brand, makeup mogul Bobbi Brown has no plans to slow down. Ms. Brown, who left Bobbi Brown Cosmetics in December 2016, reveals the key to constant reinvention and the inspiration for her newest brand, Beauty Evolution, in this weekâ€™s Secrets of Wealthy Women episode.
